alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 12:42AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New London County through 115 AM EDT... At 1241 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ledyard Center, or near Norwich, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Groton, Waterford, Ledyard, Griswold, Preston, Lisbon, Sprague, Bozrah, Gales Ferry, Ledyard Center, Montville and North Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern New London
